CHILDHOOD:
Lina has been growing up across cultures, languages and religions.
![baku](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LinaPina/linabot/master/img/baku.jpg) 
Born in Baku, she did not stay long in Azerbaijan.%[Why not?](postback:why_not?)
WHY NOT?:
Her parents moved to Russia to start a PhD and lived in Moscow since. 
As an immigrant child Lina was not eligible for a free school education. 
However, she studied hard and got into one of the most prominent German international schools in Moscow. %[Why German?!](postback:why_german?!)
WHY GERMAN?!:
Dad loves Wagner and working with Germany.
Not sure what had a more significant impact.
![wagner](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LinaPina/linabot/master/img/wagner.jpg) 
%[Let's move on](postback:lets_move_on)
LET'S MOVE ON: Ok, here's other stuff to check out. %[Childhood](postback:childhood) %[Education](postback:education) %[Career](postback:career)
EDUCATION:
She always had a strong internal drive to succeed and make her own way to the world. 
Academics came fairly easily and she graduated in top 10% from her german school and got a full scholarship for one of the best law schools in Moscow. %[Why Law?](postback:why_law)
WHY LAW?:
Lina was charmed by the charisma of Mitch McDeere, the main character from the novel 'The Firm' by John Grisham.
![firm](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LinaPina/linabot/master/img/firm.jpg) 
She then decided to be a loophole-loving corporate lawyer to make the world a better place.
The law degree taught her valuable skills like how to write, think critically and construct clear arguments. %[What's next?](postback:what's_next)
WHAT'S NEXT?:
She got her undergrad in Commercial Law from MGIMO and then an MBA from INSEAD. 
It was definitely not a linear path to the tech world. %[Why MBA?](postback:why_mba?)
WHY MBA?:
INSEAD is No.1 Business School for the World!!!
![insead](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LinaPina/linabot/master/img/insead.png)
JK JK the reality is MBA helped her develop business acumen and discover tech world.%[Other topics](postback:other_topics)
OTHER TOPICS: Ok, here's other stuff to check out. %[Childhood](postback:childhood) %[Education](postback:education) %[Career](postback:career)
CAREER:
Lina has 5 years of legal and M&A experience in tech and is passionate about venture architecture and product design. During and after INSEAD she started working on her own product Lokeit, a social discovery app in Paris.
What do you want to know more about? %[Before INSEAD](postback:before_insead) %[Right Now](postback:right_now)
BEFORE INSEAD:
Ok. She managed a portfolio of more than 400 early-stage companies, incl. some cool YCombinator startups. Highlights include 3 years at Yuri Milner's fund DST and growing a real estate startup in Manila, Philippines.
Btw you can always say 'more' to change what we're chatting about.%[And now?](postback:And_now?)
AND NOW?:
The startup Lokeit she was part of closed its doors due to funding.
![unicorn](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LinaPina/linabot/master/img/unicorn.gif)
So she's open to new opportunities.%[The perfect job](postback:the_perfect_job)
RIGHT NOW:
The startup Lokeit she was part of closed its doors due to funding.
![unicorn](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LinaPina/linabot/master/img/unicorn.gif)

THE PERFECT JOB:
What really excites her is helping businesses build products and launch them to market.
Specifically she is looking at BizDev and Venture Architecture roles because she wants to build businesses from scratch and develop them.
As you can probably tell, she is into the messaging and bot space.%[Contact](postback:contact)
